Keyboard Shortcuts

Action Shortcut
Quit application Command (⌘)-Q or apply hammer to CPU
Open Company Editor Option (⌥)-Command (⌘)-C
Open Grape Editor Option (⌥)-Command (⌘)-G
Open Purchase Editor Option (⌥)-Command (⌘)-P
